ComicInfo.Summary:
Readers head onto the seven seas with a girl who poses as a boy in order to sail the oceans. There, "Jim" meets an old friend to the SANDMAN world, Hob Gadling, who shares a tale of his own. "World's End" part 3.
Jim tells of a story that happened on an ocean. It is a tale of the seven seas, featuring a girl who posing as a boy to sail across the oceans. There, Jim meets Hob Gadling, an old friend to the SANDMAN universe, who then shares a tale of his own.
Outer Story (pgs 1, 2, 24):
Penciller: Brian TalbotInker: Mark BuckinghamInner Story (pgs 3-24):
Penciller: Michael ZulliInker: Dick Giordano
